pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 1, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Churchill, Manitoba

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an important announcement, followed by a media availability. Minister of International Trade Diversification Jim Carr will be in attendance.

Arctic Gateway Port of Churchill
1 Axworthy Way

Notes for media:

    • Pooled coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.          

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of International Trade Diversification Jim Carr, will attend a community event. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks.

Kelsey Boulevard between Munck Street and Hudson Square

Notes for media:

    • Pooled coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.

Vancouver, British Columbia

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour the TRIUMF particle accelerator centre and will make an announcement. A brief media availability will follow.

TRIUMF
University of British Columbia
4004 Wesbrook Mall

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the main lobby no later than 1:15 p.m.
    • Media are asked to confirm their attendance by email with lisa@triumf.ca, no later than 12:00 p.m. Pacific Time on November 1, 2018.
    • As TRIUMF is a working particle accelerator laboratory, there are some safety considerations to be aware of when on site. Prior to arriving at TRIUMF, all media must review the TRIUMF Guest Safety Information found here: http://www.triumf.ca/public-tours/safety-information. While no personal protective equipment is required, closed toe shoes with a low heel are required footwear. It is highly recommended that guests wear long pants.

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a keynote address and participate in a Q&A at the Greater Vancouver Board of Trade. Minister of Fisheries, Oceans and the Canadian Coast Guard Jonathan Wilkinson will be in attendance.

Vancouver Convention Centre East
999 Canada Place

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves to Room 20 East on the Meeting level no later than 3:15 p.m.
    • Media are asked to confirm their attendance by email with media@boardoftrade.com, no later than 12:00 p.m. Pacific Time on November 1, 2018.

5:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Vancouver mayor-elect Kennedy Stewart.

Topaz Room, Second Floor
Fairmont Pacific Rim
1038 Canada Place

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the end of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:45 p.m.

5:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Surrey mayor-elect Doug McCallum.

Topaz Room, Second Floor
Fairmont Pacific Rim
1038 Canada Place

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:45 p.m.
